name: Hundun
description: The Hundun is a large celestial creature embodying chaotic goodness, equipped with natural armor and possessing notable physical strength and charisma.
memorable: Its Inscrutable ability prevents others from reading its emotions or thoughts and provides strong resistance to magical effects.
goals: As a chaotic agent of goodness, it aims to challenge evil and protect those in need, using both physical prowess and spellcasting abilities.
relations: The Hundun may interact with other celestials or chaotic beings, serving as an ally or opponent in various conflicts.
environment: Typically found in places of celestial significance, possibly in the presence of other good-aligned creatures or in areas of chaos.
strengths: Immunity to acid and psychic damage, advantages on saving throws against spells, and high mobility allow it to adapt in combat.
attacks: Can deliver four Slam attacks with radiant damage enhancement, and use Motivating Babble to disrupt foes.
most_powerful_ability: Radiant Fists ability enhances melee capabilities significantly with additional radiant damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect threats without relying on sight.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Insight, and Perception, showcasing exceptional physical and sensory abilities.
additional_information: High Constitution and Wisdom saving throws enhance its resistances against magical effects.
Can cast spells without material components, providing versatility in combat situations.
Very low intelligence reflects instinctive behavior rather than logical thinking.
Resistance to multiple damage types increases its durability in battle.
Unique blend of physical attacks and magical abilities make it an unpredictable threat.
spellcasting: Can cast various spells at will or a limited number of times per day to manipulate the battlefield.
test_queries: large celestial creature with radiant fists
chaotic good monster immune to divination
flying monster with powerful melee attacks
monster with blindsight and spellcasting abilities
undetectable celestial being using chaotic magic
